prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Tayloe family. Papers, 1844-1857. Accession 27154, Personal papers collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Lent for copying by Henry Tayloe, 30 June 1969.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: The Tayloe's were a prominent family from Richmond County, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This accession contains two family letters regarding a fire at "Mt. Airy," the family home near Warsaw, Virginia, and a letter giving permission for Cornilious, Tayloes' slave, to get a wife at E.S. Sanders' house.
